root.name: Radar Scope
root.description: OverviewRadar Scope is an early arcade game developed by Nintendo originally released in Japan in 1979 and North America in 1980. A variant on the then-popular space shooter genre, the game failed to attract significant interest. Nintendo then developed Donkey Kong and converted unused Radar Scope cabinets into units for the new game. While Donkey Kong proved to be a smash success, Radar Scope has otherwise become a footnote in the company's history.
